short_description: Implements the train name finder SQL/MR function.
long_description: Implements the train name finder SQL/MR function.

input_tables.description: The input table containing text column to train

argument_clauses.name: Domain
argument_clauses.description: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queenâ€™s IP saddress or hostname.

argument_clauses.name: Database
argument_clauses.description: The name of the database where the input table is located.

argument_clauses.name: UserId
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.

argument_clauses.name: Password
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database password of the user.

argument_clauses.name: SSLSettings
argument_clauses.description: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.

argument_clauses.name: SSLTrustStorePassword
argument_clauses.description: The password for the SSL truststore.

argument_clauses.name: TextColumn
argument_clauses.description: The input table column whose contents will be scanned. Only one column is permitted Input columns must contain string SQL types.

argument_clauses.name: Model
argument_clauses.description: The name of the data model file to be generated. The SQL-MR function will find the data model file in the dictionary fold or in the database

argument_clauses.name: Encoding
argument_clauses.description: Encoding of text. The default value is UTF-8.

argument_clauses.name: Language
argument_clauses.description: The language to train model. The default value is en.

argument_clauses.name: IterNum
argument_clauses.description: The iterator number for training. The input value must be greater than 0. The default value is 100.

argument_clauses.name: Cutoff
argument_clauses.description: The cutoff number for training. The input value must be no less than 0. The default value is 0.
